## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (`fix`)
- [ ] New feature (`feat`)
- [ ] Refactoring (`refactor`)
- [ ] Tests (`test`)
- [ ] Documentation (`docs`)
- [ ] Maintenance (`chore`)

## Checklist

- [ ] Terraform tests pass (`terraform test` in affected modules)
- [ ] BATS tests pass (`bats --recursive tests/`)
- [ ] Shellcheck passes on new/modified scripts
- [ ] Docker images pinned with SHA256 digest (if applicable)
- [ ] Variables have validation blocks and descriptions
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, CHANGELOG)
- [ ] Commit messages follow Conventional Commits
